Policies and Initiatives.title: Before the first missiles fly: AI, cyber & electronic warfare - how India is preparing for invisible battlefields
Policies and Initiatives.summary: India is integrating AI, cyber, and electronic warfare into its military architecture, adopting a process-centric doctrine. This shift aims to enhance intelligence, surveillance, and reconnaissance capabilities, seeking strategic dominance. The move also reduces India's reliance on foreign technology in future conflicts.

AI Start-Up News.title: Maharashtra poised to lead Indiaâ€™s public-sector AI adoption: Wadhwani AI
AI Start-Up News.summary: Maharashtra is expected to take the lead in India's public-sector adoption of artificial intelligence (AI). According to Wadhwani AI, the state is poised to drive AI adoption in the public sector. This development is anticipated to have a significant impact on India's AI landscape.
